titles.title: Capping Drug Costs for Seniors Act of 2022
Capping Drug Costs for Seniors Act of 2022
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for a cap on beneficiary liability under part D of the Medicare program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Capping Drug Costs for Seniors Act of 2022
This bill caps annual out-of-pocket spending under the Medicare prescription drug benefit.
